title: Average Absolute Annual Earnings of Employees or Wage Earners in All Manufacturing Industries for the United States
notes:
Source: P.H. Douglas, Real Wages In The United States, 1890-1926, Pp. 239-240; The Movement Of Money And Real Earnings In The United States, 1926-1928, P. 10, (University Of Chicago Studies In Business Administration.)
